name: Car Brawl
description:
Are you ready for the most epic car-crashing game of all time?

In that case, this is not the game you are looking for...

But it is still darn close!

In Car Brawl you will:

  • Crash
  • Drive
  • Shoot
  • Crash
  • Heal
  • Have lots of fun!
  • Did I mention you will crash?

Car Brawl is a local multiplayer game for the whole family to enjoy. The goal of the game is to be the last survivor after an epic car fight between you and your friends. Do you have what it takes to beat your friends and claim victory?

You can play up to four people with controllers, two people on a keyboard, or if you are feeling a little daring you can mix them and play two on keyboard and two on controllers.

Even though the game is playable as it is, I want to develop it even further. Content I want to add later:

  • More cars
  • More backgrounds
  • More powerups
  • New gamemodes
  • Online multiplayer?
